org.apache.cassandra.db

Class CBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.CBuilder

  • public abstract class CBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to build ClusteringPrefixes, either Clustering or Slice.Bound.
